00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : MPI_UpdateRhoF

00032 
00033  SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateRhoF
00034 
00035 ! Common Variables
00036  USE Domain
00037  USE FluidParams
00038  USE LBMParams
00039  USE MPIParams
00040  USE MPI
00041  IMPLICIT NONE
00042 
00043 ! Local Variables
00044  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00045  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00046  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00047 
00048 
00049 !--------- Calculate the updated density rho_f ---------------------------------
00050  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00051    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00052       rho_f(i,j) = fbar(i,j,0) + fbar(i,j,1) + fbar(i,j,2) + fbar(i,j,3) + fbar(i,j,4) &
00053                  + fbar(i,j,5) + fbar(i,j,6) + fbar(i,j,7) + fbar(i,j,8)
00054    END DO
00055  END DO
00056 
00057 !--------- Save data from real nodes -------------------------------------------
00058 ! X DIRECTION
00059  count = 1
00060  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00061    rho_west_snd(count)     = rho_f(xl_f  ,j)
00062    rho_west_snd(count + 1) = rho_f(xl_f+1,j)
00063    rho_west_snd(count + 2) = rho_f(xl_f+2,j)
00064 
00065    rho_east_snd(count)     = rho_f(xu_f  ,j)
00066    rho_east_snd(count + 1) = rho_f(xu_f-1,j)
00067    rho_east_snd(count + 2) = rho_f(xu_f-2,j)
00068    count = count + 3
00069  END DO
00070 
00071 ! Y DIRECTION
00072  count = 1
00073  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00074    rho_south_snd(count)     = rho_f(i,yl_f  )
00075    rho_south_snd(count + 1) = rho_f(i,yl_f+1)
00076    rho_south_snd(count + 2) = rho_f(i,yl_f+2)
00077 
00078    rho_north_snd(count)     = rho_f(i,yu_f  )
00079    rho_north_snd(count + 1) = rho_f(i,yu_f-1)
00080    rho_north_snd(count + 2) = rho_f(i,yu_f-2)
00081    count = count + 3
00082  END DO
00083 
00084 ! NE DIAGONAL
00085  rho_ne_snd(1) = rho_f(xu_f  ,yu_f  )
00086  rho_ne_snd(2) = rho_f(xu_f-1,yu_f  )
00087  rho_ne_snd(3) = rho_f(xu_f-2,yu_f  )
00088  rho_ne_snd(4) = rho_f(xu_f  ,yu_f-1)
00089  rho_ne_snd(5) = rho_f(xu_f-1,yu_f-1)
00090  rho_ne_snd(6) = rho_f(xu_f-2,yu_f-1)
00091  rho_ne_snd(7) = rho_f(xu_f  ,yu_f-2)
00092  rho_ne_snd(8) = rho_f(xu_f-1,yu_f-2)
00093  rho_ne_snd(9) = rho_f(xu_f-2,yu_f-2)
00094  
00095 ! NW DIAGONAL
00096  rho_nw_snd(1) = rho_f(xl_f  ,yu_f  )
00097  rho_nw_snd(2) = rho_f(xl_f+1,yu_f  )
00098  rho_nw_snd(3) = rho_f(xl_f+2,yu_f  )
00099  rho_nw_snd(4) = rho_f(xl_f  ,yu_f-1)
00100  rho_nw_snd(5) = rho_f(xl_f+1,yu_f-1)
00101  rho_nw_snd(6) = rho_f(xl_f+2,yu_f-1)
00102  rho_nw_snd(7) = rho_f(xl_f  ,yu_f-2)
00103  rho_nw_snd(8) = rho_f(xl_f+1,yu_f-2)
00104  rho_nw_snd(9) = rho_f(xl_f+2,yu_f-2)
00105 
00106 ! SW DIAGONAL
00107  rho_sw_snd(1) = rho_f(xl_f  ,yl_f  )
00108  rho_sw_snd(2) = rho_f(xl_f+1,yl_f  )
00109  rho_sw_snd(3) = rho_f(xl_f+2,yl_f  )
00110  rho_sw_snd(4) = rho_f(xl_f  ,yl_f+1)
00111  rho_sw_snd(5) = rho_f(xl_f+1,yl_f+1)
00112  rho_sw_snd(6) = rho_f(xl_f+2,yl_f+1)
00113  rho_sw_snd(7) = rho_f(xl_f  ,yl_f+2)
00114  rho_sw_snd(8) = rho_f(xl_f+1,yl_f+2)
00115  rho_sw_snd(9) = rho_f(xl_f+2,yl_f+2)
00116 
00117 ! SE DIAGONAL 
00118  rho_se_snd(1) = rho_f(xu_f  ,yl_f  )
00119  rho_se_snd(2) = rho_f(xu_f-1,yl_f  )
00120  rho_se_snd(3) = rho_f(xu_f-2,yl_f  )
00121  rho_se_snd(4) = rho_f(xu_f  ,yl_f+1)
00122  rho_se_snd(5) = rho_f(xu_f-1,yl_f+1)
00123  rho_se_snd(6) = rho_f(xu_f-2,yl_f+1)
00124  rho_se_snd(7) = rho_f(xu_f  ,yl_f+2)
00125  rho_se_snd(8) = rho_f(xu_f-1,yl_f+2)
00126  rho_se_snd(9) = rho_f(xu_f-2,yl_f+2)
00127 
00128 
00129 !--------- Exchange information using MPI calls --------------------------------
00130 ! X DIRECTION
00131  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_east_rcv, xsize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, tag1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00132  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_west_snd, xsize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, tag1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00133  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00134 
00135  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_west_rcv, xsize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00136  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_east_snd, xsize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00137  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00138 
00139 ! Y DIRECTION
00140  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_north_rcv, ysize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, tag3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00141  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_south_snd, ysize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, tag3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00142  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00143 
00144  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_south_rcv, ysize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00145  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_north_snd, ysize3_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00146  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00147 
00148 ! DIAGONALS
00149  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_ne_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, tag1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00150  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_sw_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, tag1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00151  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00152 
00153  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_nw_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00154  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_se_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, tag2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00155  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00156 
00157  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_se_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, tag3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00158  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_nw_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, tag3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00159  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00160 
00161  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_sw_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00162  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_ne_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, tag4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00163  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00164 
00165 
00166 !--------- Update the density rho_f in the three ghost layers  -----------------
00167 ! X DIRECTION
00168  count = 1
00169  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00170    rho_f(xug_f ,j) = rho_east_rcv(count)
00171    rho_f(xug2_f,j) = rho_east_rcv(count + 1)
00172    rho_f(xug3_f,j) = rho_east_rcv(count + 2)
00173 
00174    rho_f(xlg_f ,j) = rho_west_rcv(count)
00175    rho_f(xlg2_f,j) = rho_west_rcv(count + 1)
00176    rho_f(xlg3_f,j) = rho_west_rcv(count + 2)
00177    count = count + 3
00178  END DO
00179 
00180 ! Y DIRECTION
00181  count = 1
00182  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00183    rho_f(i,yug_f ) = rho_north_rcv(count)
00184    rho_f(i,yug2_f) = rho_north_rcv(count + 1)
00185    rho_f(i,yug3_f) = rho_north_rcv(count + 2)
00186 
00187    rho_f(i,ylg_f ) = rho_south_rcv(count)
00188    rho_f(i,ylg2_f) = rho_south_rcv(count + 1)
00189    rho_f(i,ylg3_f) = rho_south_rcv(count + 2)
00190    count = count + 3
00191  END DO
00192 
00193 ! NE DIAGONAL
00194  rho_f(xug_f ,yug_f ) = rho_ne_rcv(1)
00195  rho_f(xug2_f,yug_f ) = rho_ne_rcv(2)
00196  rho_f(xug3_f,yug_f ) = rho_ne_rcv(3)
00197  rho_f(xug_f ,yug2_f) = rho_ne_rcv(4)
00198  rho_f(xug2_f,yug2_f) = rho_ne_rcv(5)
00199  rho_f(xug3_f,yug2_f) = rho_ne_rcv(6)
00200  rho_f(xug_f ,yug3_f) = rho_ne_rcv(7)
00201  rho_f(xug2_f,yug3_f) = rho_ne_rcv(8)
00202  rho_f(xug3_f,yug3_f) = rho_ne_rcv(9)
00203 
00204 ! NW DIAGONAL 
00205  rho_f(xlg_f ,yug_f ) = rho_nw_rcv(1)
00206  rho_f(xlg2_f,yug_f ) = rho_nw_rcv(2)
00207  rho_f(xlg3_f,yug_f ) = rho_nw_rcv(3)
00208  rho_f(xlg_f ,yug2_f) = rho_nw_rcv(4)
00209  rho_f(xlg2_f,yug2_f) = rho_nw_rcv(5)
00210  rho_f(xlg3_f,yug2_f) = rho_nw_rcv(6)
00211  rho_f(xlg_f ,yug3_f) = rho_nw_rcv(7)
00212  rho_f(xlg2_f,yug3_f) = rho_nw_rcv(8)
00213  rho_f(xlg3_f,yug3_f) = rho_nw_rcv(9)
00214 
00215 ! SW DIAGONAL 
00216  rho_f(xlg_f ,ylg_f ) = rho_sw_rcv(1)
00217  rho_f(xlg2_f,ylg_f ) = rho_sw_rcv(2)
00218  rho_f(xlg3_f,ylg_f ) = rho_sw_rcv(3)
00219  rho_f(xlg_f ,ylg2_f) = rho_sw_rcv(4)
00220  rho_f(xlg2_f,ylg2_f) = rho_sw_rcv(5)
00221  rho_f(xlg3_f,ylg2_f) = rho_sw_rcv(6)
00222  rho_f(xlg_f ,ylg3_f) = rho_sw_rcv(7)
00223  rho_f(xlg2_f,ylg3_f) = rho_sw_rcv(8)
00224  rho_f(xlg3_f,ylg3_f) = rho_sw_rcv(9)
00225 
00226 ! SE DIAGONAL
00227  rho_f(xug_f ,ylg_f ) = rho_se_rcv(1)
00228  rho_f(xug2_f,ylg_f ) = rho_se_rcv(2)
00229  rho_f(xug3_f,ylg_f ) = rho_se_rcv(3)
00230  rho_f(xug_f ,ylg2_f) = rho_se_rcv(4)
00231  rho_f(xug2_f,ylg2_f) = rho_se_rcv(5)
00232  rho_f(xug3_f,ylg2_f) = rho_se_rcv(6)
00233  rho_f(xug_f ,ylg3_f) = rho_se_rcv(7)
00234  rho_f(xug2_f,ylg3_f) = rho_se_rcv(8)
00235  rho_f(xug3_f,ylg3_f) = rho_se_rcv(9)
00236 
00237  RETURN
00238  END SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateRhoF
